members.joinCircumstances: Largo is the captain and founder of the Amigo Pirates.
Corto is Largo's brother and serves as a key member of the crew.

keyMoments.title: Amigo Pirates Surface at Little East Blue
keyMoments.description: The Amigo Pirates emerge from the ocean in their submarine and arrive at Little East Blue with the mission to capture Boss the beetle for Shiki.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the Amigo Pirates as antagonists of the Little East Blue arc.

keyMoments.title: Amigo Pirates Attack Little East Blue
keyMoments.description: The Amigo Pirates launch their assault on Little East Blue, destroying structures and demanding the villagers hand over Boss.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Amigo Pirates as a threat and triggers the main conflict of the arc.

ships.description: A submarine vessel used by the Amigo Pirates to travel and launch surprise attacks.

notes: The Amigo Pirates are an anime-only crew created for the Little East Blue arc. They have a mariachi theme and work under the Golden Lion Shiki to capture Boss the beetle.
